meanings.definition: A strip of material worn around the waist to hold clothing in place.
meanings.sent1: She adjusted her waistbands before heading out for a walk.
meanings.sent2: The new pants had sturdy waistbands that kept them up well.
meanings.sent3: The waistbands decided to have a competition to see who could hold up the most weight.
meanings.sent4: Her loyalty to her favorite brand of waistbands was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The colorful waistbands on the display caught her eye immediately.

meanings.definition: The upper edge of a garment that fits around the waist.
meanings.sent1: The dress had a beautiful lace waistbands that added elegance to the design.
meanings.sent2: His shirt kept riding up, revealing the waistbands of his boxers.
meanings.sent3: The waistbands of the skirt rebelled and refused to stay in place during the fashion show.
meanings.sent4: The waistbands of the jacket hugged her waist snugly, giving her a flattering silhouette.
meanings.sent5: The tailor carefully sewed the waistbands to ensure a perfect fit for the customer.
